params.taskDescription:
If you draw a single card, what is:

  1. P ( draw a 2 ) P({\text{draw a 2}})
  2. P ( draw a 2 | draw a  ♡ ) P({\text{draw a 2}}|{\text{draw a }}\heartsuit)
  3. P ( draw a 2 | draw a  ♠ ) P({\text{draw a 2}}|{\text{draw a }}\spadesuit )

params.taskDescription:
If you draw a single card, what is:

  1. P ( draw a  ♡ ) P({\text{draw a }}\heartsuit)
  2. P ( draw a  ♡ | draw a 3 ) P({\text{draw a }}\heartsuit|{\text{draw a 3}})
  3. P ( draw a  ♡ | draw a 2 ) P({\text{draw a }}\heartsuit|{\text{draw a 2}})
